alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 7:52AM PST until December 01 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
